description: 6-day eco-friendly, solo, budget trip to Thailand (Bangkok–Ayutthaya–Chiang Mai), 10–15 September 2025. Focus on local cuisine, authentic experiences, spa session, and sustainable travel. Solo traveller, $1000 budget.

activities: Arrive in Bangkok. Explore Chatuchak Market (if weekend) or Old Town. Try street food (Pad Thai, mango sticky rice) for dinner.
itinerary.transportation: Public transit, trains and buses for intercity travel. Walking and bicycles for local transport. Flights only if train/bus impractical, but prioritized eco-friendly options.

results.hotelName: Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit 55 Thong Lo
Divalux Resort and Spa Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
Amari Don Muang Airport Bangkok Hotel
Siam Mandarina Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport Hotel (Free Shuttle)
The Park Nine Hotel Suvarnabhumi - Free BKK Airport Shuttle
Centara Grand at Central World Hotel

itinerary.notes: Budget: $1000 max for all expenses. Prioritize local food, hostels/guesthouses, public transportation, and eco-friendly activities. Bring reusable items. Spa session booked in Chiang Mai.

activities: Visit Grand Palace, Wat Pho. Afternoon canal tour (eco-friendly longtail boat). Sample local cuisine at Khao San Road.

results.hotelName: Grande Centre Point Sukhumvit 55 Thong Lo
Divalux Resort and Spa Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
Amari Don Muang Airport Bangkok Hotel
Siam Mandarina Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport Hotel (Free Shuttle)
The Park Nine Hotel Suvarnabhumi - Free BKK Airport Shuttle
Centara Grand at Central World Hotel

activities: Take morning train (eco-friendly option) or bus to Ayutthaya. Explore historical temples by bicycle. Evening return to Bangkok.

activities: Morning train/flight to Chiang Mai. Explore Old City temples. Evening street food tour at Chiang Mai Night Bazaar.

results.hotelName: De Chai the Deco Chiang Mai Hotel
Away Chiang Mai Thapae Resort - A Vegan Retreat

activities: Join eco-friendly spa & wellness session (traditional Thai massage) in Chiang Mai. Optional visit to Doi Suthep or local markets. Enjoy Khao Soi for dinner.

results.hotelName: De Chai the Deco Chiang Mai Hotel

activities: Morning walk at city park (Buak Hard Garden). Visit a local café. Depart from Chiang Mai.
